title: What is APE WARRIOR?
answer: APEWARRIOR is a community-driven cryptocurrency project built on the strength and unity of the Ape spirit. It aims to achieve a $100 million market cap by harnessing the collective power of its community. APEWARRIOR is not just a token; it's an entire ecosystem designed to provide unique benefits to its holders.

title: Why APE WARRIOR?
answer: APEWARRIOR offers a unique and exciting opportunity for investors and crypto enthusiasts. We stand out because of our ambitious goal, community-driven approach, and innovative features. By joining APEWARRIOR, you become part of a movement that's determined to make its mark on the crypto world.

title: What is APEWARRIOR Utility?
answer: APEWARRIOR UTILITY represents the practical uses and benefits of our APE token within our ecosystem. While we're continuously exploring new use cases, currently, APE tokens can be used for staking, providing access to exclusive features, and participating in governance decisions. We're actively working on expanding the utility to offer even more value to our community.

title: When can I get my $APE Tokens?
answer: As soon as presale is over, we will announce claim date. Everyone who purchases $APES will be able to claim their tokens directly from the site. ONLY USE OFFICIAL APE WARRIOR SITE!!!!

title: When can I Trade YANDER?
answer: We will list $APE on a top Decentralized Exchange after presale. We will announce claim and listing date then
